price: Gurbaan tokko moggaa magaalattii irraa fiigaa dhufee “Yaa Muusaa! qondaalonni [Fir’awn] si ajjeesuuf sirratti mari’achaa jiru; ani namoota toltuu siif yaadan irraayii [magaalattii irraa] bahi” jedhe.
arabic: وَجَآءَ رَجُلٞ مِّنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱلۡمَلَأَ يَأۡتَمِرُونَ بِكَ لِيَقۡتُلُوكَ فَٱخۡرُجۡ إِنِّي لَكَ مِنَ ٱلنَّٰصِحِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wajāa rajulun min aqṣā al-madīnati yasʿā qāla yāmūsā inna al-mala-a yatamirūna bika liyaqtulūka fa-ukh'ruj innī laka mina al-nāṣiḥīna
